```{r Validation rule 10: "The patient record has a completed enrolment or surveillance end form but a surgical procedure form is not completed"}

problems <- problems |>
  bind_rows(
    patients |>
      inner_join(
        enrollments |>
          inner_join(data$surgeries, join_by(key == enrollment)),
        join_by(key == patient)) |>
      filter((enrollment_status == "COMPLETED" | surveillanceEnd_status == "COMPLETED") & status != "COMPLETED") |>
      mutate(
        EVENT_ID = event,
        EVENT_TYPE = event_types("SUR"),
        EVENT_DATE = occurredAt,
        PROBLEM_ID = 10L,
        ENROLMENT_STATUS = enrollment_status,
        SURVEILLANCE_END_STATUS = surveillanceEnd_status,
        SURGERY_STATUS = status,
        .keep = "unused") |>
      select(
        SITE_CODE,
        DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        DEPARTMENT_OU,
        NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID,
        PATIENT_TEI,
        ENROLMENT_ID,
        ENROLMENT_DATE,
        EVENT_ID,
        EVENT_TYPE,
        EVENT_DATE,
        PROBLEM_ID,
        ENROLMENT_STATUS,
        SURVEILLANCE_END_STATUS,
        SURGERY_STATUS
        ))
```
